title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Business Model Canvas Design Workshop Using Visual Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the nine components of the Business Model Canvas (BMC) using visual metaphors.
Learners can apply the BMC to real-world cases through team projects and complete business model design reports.
Learners can propose at least three problem-solving strategies within an organization through BMC analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
